description: This source file defines a Java class named DateVariable, which extends BaseVariable. It represents a date variable with methods for encoding/decoding in native and Java formats, resolving references, and providing variable properties related to date handling in the context of a generated code project.

classes.name: DateVariable
classes.description: Represents a Date variable with methods for encoding/decoding in various formats and resolving references within a code generation context.

methods.name: DateVariable
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a DateVariable instance with an ICDateVariable bean.

methods.name: DateVariable
methods.description: Constructor that creates a DateVariable instance with a specified variable name.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Overrides BaseVariable method; no references to resolve for DateVariable.

methods.name: isDate
methods.description: Overrides BaseVariable method; returns true, indicating this variable represents a date.

methods.name: getCtype
methods.description: Overrides BaseVariable method; returns the C language type for date variable ('uint64_t').

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Overrides BaseVariable method; returns the Java IPC object type ('DateIPC').

methods.name: getJavaType
methods.description: Overrides BaseVariable method; returns the Java class type ('Date').

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Overrides BaseVariable method; returns the JSON key for date variables.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code lines for encoding the date variable into a native JSON structure.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code lines for decoding the date variable from a native JSON structure.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code lines for encoding the date variable into a JSON object.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code lines for decoding the date variable from a JSON object.
